headline: Did Leidos’ OpenAI-Focused NorthStar 2030 Strategy Just Shift Leidos Holdings' (LDOS) Investment Narrative?
summary: Leidos Holdings recently announced a partnership with OpenAI to integrate generative and agentic AI into federal workflows across digital modernization, health services, national security, infrastructure, and defense as part of its NorthStar 2030 strategy. A distinctive aspect of this collaboration is Leidos’ plan to embed OpenAI tools both in customer-facing systems and in its own internal automation, aiming to accelerate product design and delivery for government clients. We’ll now explore...

headline: Leidos Partners With OpenAI to Deploy AI Solutions Across Sectors
summary: LDOS teams up with OpenAI to embed generative and agentic AI into mission-critical government workflows across defense, health and infrastructure.
